purpose: Construct context-incidence graphs for aut=6 reduced-kernel contexts (collapsed orbits) in N12_54 and N12_57; export bipartite and projected graphs; compute invariants and spectra.
graphs_built: Context adjacency by subspace-intersection dimension >=1 (very sparse).
Context adjacency by dot_score>=3 among 3x3 mod2 dot-products between class vectors (dense; connected).
notes: Exact class sharing between contexts is rare (hence the ultra-sparse exact-share projection).

Using dot-score similarity between the 3 H1 class vectors in each context yields a robust, connected context geometry (especially in N12_57), suitable for comparing with measurement-context incidence structures.
The bipartite graph is the most faithful representation (contexts vs classes) and is recommended for further embedding / comparison tasks.
